name: Python tool (via uv)
description: Installs a Python tool using uv.

uv_version.description: The version of uv to install. Set to 'latest' to always get the latest version.

package.description: The package to install commands from.

from.description: Use the given package to provide the command. By default, the package name is assumed to match the command name.

with.description: Space-separated list of additional packages to include as dependencies (does not install their executables). Supports version constraints, e.g., 'mkdocs-material mkdocs-minify-plugin>=0.7,<0.8'

with-executables-from.description: Comma-separated list of packages to include as dependencies and install their executables, e.g., 'ansible-core,ansible-lint'

python.description: Specify the Python version to use.
